thread.title: 3 Day Pit Stop From Italy
thread.title_full: 3 Day Pit Stop From Italy - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Victor H
title: 3 Day Pit Stop From Italy
text:
Mohammed and Polly at the Manhattan breakfast were awesome! They are such nice people they will take very great care of you and your family. Please take care of them as well as they are honest, hard working people.
Thank you Mohammed and Polly!
Italy-->NYC-->Phoenix
Victor, Araceli & Ava Huerta
Phoenix, Arizona
#FreeAgentProperties in "Google"
